name: Arron Bennett Building Contractors
description: Traditional building contractors specializing in stone masonry, heritage restoration, and modern construction methods. Serving Cornwall and Devon with over 20 years of experience.
slogan: Quality craftsmanship backed by over 20 years of experience

itemOffered.name: Full Builds
itemOffered.description: Complete new construction projects including new build homes, barn conversions, and bespoke properties using traditional and modern methods

itemOffered.name: Home Renovations
itemOffered.description: Full restoration and renovation projects combining traditional methods with new technology, specializing in period properties and listed buildings

itemOffered.name: Stone and Block Masonry
itemOffered.description: Specialist stone and block masonry including stone cladding, chimneys, boundary walls, retaining walls, Cornish dry stone walling, and granite hedging

itemOffered.name: Kitchen and Bathroom Renovations
itemOffered.description: Complete kitchen and bathroom renovation projects preserving traditional character while incorporating modern fixtures and fittings

itemOffered.name: Hard Landscaping
itemOffered.description: Retaining walls, Cornish dry stone walling, block paving for patios, driveways, and entrances using traditional techniques

itemOffered.name: Project Management
itemOffered.description: Full project oversight from material ordering to finishing touches, liaising with clients, contractors, architects, and engineers

itemOffered.name: Ground Source and Air Source Heat Pump Installations
itemOffered.description: Energy-efficient, sustainable heating solutions with certified installations and thorough suitability assessments

itemOffered.name: Traditional Lime Mortars
itemOffered.description: Lime rendering, plastering, lime putties, and repointing for conservation and new traditional builds with over 20 years of experience

itemOffered.name: Mini Excavator and Waste Management Services
itemOffered.description: Professional site preparation and responsible waste disposal for construction projects

name: Arron Bennett
description: Traditional builder with 20+ years of experience specializing in stone masonry, heritage restoration, and modern construction methods in Cornwall
